SELECT review_link AS reviewLink, user_name AS userName, user_link AS userLink, review_date AS reviewDate, star_score AS starScore, review_title AS reviewTitle, review_content AS reviewContent, corp_name AS companyName, android_app_name AS androidAppName, android_app_version AS androidAppVersion
FROM android_app_review, corporation, android_app, google_play
WHERE android_app.corp_id = corporation.corp_id AND android_app.android_app_id = google_play.android_app_id AND android_app_review.google_app_version = google_play.google_app_version AND android_app_review.android_app_id = google_play.android_app_id
